interaction.name: Multiple Choice
interaction.title: Select the appropriate introduction from the options below.

responses.response: “Hi, I’m {{your name}} with Instacart Care. Am I speaking with {name on account}?”
“Hi, I’m {{your name}} with Instacart Care. Before we begin, please provide the phone number for your account.”
